verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — President Donald Trump [V: has] warned Congress that he will never sign another foot - tall , $ 1 trillion - plus government - wide spending bill like the one he did in March

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: warned] [ARG2: Congress] [ARG1: that he will never sign another foot - tall , $ 1 trillion - plus government - wide spending bill like the one he did in March]
WASHINGTON ( AP ) — President Donald Trump has warned Congress that he [V: will] never sign another foot - tall , $ 1 trillion - plus government - wide spending bill like the one he did in March

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — President Donald Trump has warned Congress that [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-NEG: never] [V: sign] [ARG1: another foot - tall , $ 1 trillion - plus government - wide spending bill like the one he did in March]

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — President Donald Trump has warned Congress that he will never sign another foot - tall , $ 1 trillion - plus government - wide spending bill like [ARG1: the one] [ARG0: he] [V: did] [ARGM-TMP: in March]
